metadata.name: Guest Account Enabled Via Sysadminctl
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to enable the guest account using the sysadminctl utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sysadminctl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -guestaccount')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' on')))

output.summary: Detects attempts to enable the guest account using the sysadminctl utility
